code: /**  * Creates a new {@link org.apache.camel.spi.RoutePolicy} which will be assigned to the given route.  *  * @param camelContext the camel context  * @param routeId      the route id  * @param route        the route definition  * @return the created {@link org.apache.camel.spi.RoutePolicy}, or <tt>null</tt> to not use a policy for this route  */ RoutePolicy createRoutePolicy(CamelContext camelContext, String routeId, NamedNode route).
